com.othersonline.kv.backends
Class FileSystemKeyValueStore

java.lang.Object
  com.othersonline.kv.BaseKeyValueStore
      com.othersonline.kv.BaseManagedKeyValueStore
          com.othersonline.kv.backends.FileSystemKeyValueStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyValueStore, ManagedKeyValueStore
public class FileSystemKeyValueStore
extends BaseManagedKeyValueStore

A key value store that uses the local file system for content.

Author:
samtingleff

exists

public boolean exists(String key)
               throws KeyValueStoreException,
                      IOException
Description copied from interface: KeyValueStore
Determine whether or not a given key exists. On backends that do not provide native support for this primitive (memcached, tokyo tyrant) we will call get() and compare to null. This may be a more expensive operation than you would like.

Specified by:
exists in interface KeyValueStore
Specified by:
exists in class BaseKeyValueStore
Throws:
